item.ptxt: Confirm the sheet thickness, tensile strength, and existence of the zinc treatment of both sides, and set the welder to conform to the welding conditions by referring to Roof and Side Panel Construction, and Floor and Rear Body Construction.
Welding symbols (The welding symbols with dashed lines have a meaning of the spot welding of the part which is not visible)

s1.ptxt: Clamp new rear frame B, and measure the rear frame diagonally.

ptxt.sie-ref01: Front floor and rear floor, under view

s1.ptxt: Temporarily install the rear suspension, and check the rear frame position.
Set the new rear frame end flange to rear frame B.
Clamp the rear floor and rear frame upper stiffener B/rear floor side panel.
Clamp the rear panel, temporarily install the rear bumper beam, and check the body dimensions:

ptxt.sie-ref02: Rear pillar gutter and rear panel positions

s1.ptxt: Tack weld the rear frame end flange.
Remove rear frame upper stiffener B/rear floor side panel and the rear floor.
Weld rear frame B to rear frame A. Weld the rear frame end flange (C).
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Do the main welding. Weld the rear floor (A) and rear frame upper stiffener B.
( )*: Welding positions with MPa or higher parts. Confirm the plug welding conditions.
Weld the rear floor side panel (A).
